p: In this study, we selected 58 species of Venezuelan medicinal plants used by indigenous communities for the treatment of respiratory symptoms and evaluated extracts of different plant parts in a screen for natural compounds that have potential as antituberculosis. We tested a total of 118 extracts of different plant parts and of the 14 that inhibited the growth of M. tuberculosis mc 26020 and 36 that inhibited the in vitro activity of PSTK PknB, and there were five that had both inhibitory activities.
